page.title: 04THE ICE FACTORY
page.content: DURING A WALK ON MAY 27th WE WERE INVITED TO LOOK ROUND THE{ICE FACTORY. IT USED TO BE A FAMILY BUSINESS OWNED BY J+M SHEARER BUT NOW IT'S OWNED BY L.H.D. THE{ICE FACTORY}WAS OPENED AFTER THE SECOND WORLD WAR IN 1946.THE FACTORY MAKES ICE FOR ALL FISHING BOATS THAT COME IN TO{LERWICK AND {SCALLOWAY.}75 THOUSAND GALLONS OF WATER ARE USED TO MAKE ICE EVERY WEEK.THE{FACTORY}SENDS ICE TO{ {SCALLOWAY}WHICH IS BOUGHT AT{Â£23 PER {TON}IN BARRELS OR IN BROWN BAGS. APPROXMATELY{2 THOUSAND}TONS OF ICE IS SENT FROM THE{LERWICK ICE FACTORY}TO{ {SCALLOWAY}EVERY YEAR. 13 TO 14 BOATS COME IN TO LERWICK EVERY WEEK TO GET ICE.THERE ARE 6 PEOPLE EMPLOYED AT THE{FACTORY}AND ONE DRIVER.THE ICE IS USED TO KEEP THE FISH FRESH UNTIL IT REACHES ITS DESTINATION. { }
